head.title: Avis Net Rises Sharply In 2nd Quarter and Half

hedline.hl1: Avis Net Rises Sharply In 2nd Quarter and Half

abstract.p: Avis reports rise in net income in quarter ended June 30, to $36.4 million on 4.7 percent rise in revenue, to $1.1 billion; reports rise in six-month income, to $57 million, on revenue of $2.1 billion (S)

block.p: Net income reported by Avis (NYSE: AVI), which is based in East Garden City, rose to $37.4 million in the quarter ended June 30, from $27.3 million a year earlier.
Diluted earnings per share rose to $1.05, from 85 cents. Revenue for the quarter rose 4.7 percent, to $1.1 billion.
Net income reported by Avis (NYSE: AVI), which is based in East Garden City, rose to $37.4 million in the quarter ended June 30, from $27.3 million a year earlier.
Diluted earnings per share rose to $1.05, from 85 cents. Revenue for the quarter rose 4.7 percent, to $1.1 billion.

Net income for the six months ended June 30 rose to $57 million, from $42.5 million a year earlier. Diluted earnings for the six-month period rose to $1.52, from $1.31. Revenue for the six months was $2.1 billion.
